programme.title: Detective Montalbano: Mirror Effect (Sn 1 Ep 24)
programme.desc: Murder, betrayal, temptation…it's all in a day's work for Detective Montalbano. Montalbano gets to know his neighbor, who appears to have a secret agenda. Italian with English subtitles.

programme.title: Whirlpool
programme.desc: On vacation, Mongeville witnesses the death of a young heiress.

programme.title: Captain Marleau
programme.desc: Offbeat Captain Marleau solves crimes in her own, Columbo-style way. A famous racecar driver dodges a bullet and Marleau sees suspects all around. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: The Cursed Manor (Sn 1 Ep 9)
programme.desc: Inspector and family man Simon Magellan unravels crimes and mysteries in the fictional French town of Saignac. The owner of a sinister mansion is found dead, his face distorted by an expression of terror. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Hjerson (Dubbed)
programme.desc: An unpublished novel inspires a copycat murder at a restaurant. Only five people, including the author, have read the work so it must be an inside job. Or is it? The author contacts Hjerson and Klara to crack the case.

programme.title: Sudden Death (Sn 1 Ep 5)
programme.desc: Inspector and family man Simon Magellan unravels crimes and mysteries in the fictional French town of Saignac. The golf course is the perfect place to relax… or get murdered. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Tatort: Dortmund
programme.desc: A murderer remains at the scene of the crime and demands to speak with Peter Faber.

programme.title: Tatort: Dortmund
programme.desc: During an investigation into a fire, the team is confronted with racism, police violence and fake news.

programme.title: Tatort: Dortmund
programme.desc: Peter Faber and his team investigate after the police chief is involved in an accident.

programme.desc: Peter Faber and his team investigate after the police chief is involved in an accident.

programme.title: Optical Illusion (Sn 1 Ep 5)
programme.desc: Offbeat Captain Marleau solves crimes in her own, Columbo-style way. There are too many leads in Marleau's investigation into the death of a celebrity's nanny. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Murder In
programme.desc: Part of a gorgeous collection of mysteries, each one set in a different, picturesque region of France. A shepherd is murdered in mountain pastures and most of the villagers suspect the former schoolteacher. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Murder In
programme.desc: Police Captain Basile Tissier returns to the city he once fled as a child to investigate a witchcraft murder.
